# Adamantine Dagger
## Overview
**Aura** no aura (nonmagical); **CL** â€”

**Slot** none

**Price** 3,002 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

This nonmagical [[Dagger|dagger]] is made out of [[Adamantine|adamantine]]. As a masterwork weapon, it has a +1 enhancement bonus on attack rolls.

Source: PF Core Rulebook, pg. 472
